title: Videos
body:
Individual videos can be embedded using the `<help-video>` element:

<help-video data-id='video-under-section'></help-video>

If the video is not found, this placeholder will display:

<help-video data-id='not-found'></help-video>

Video collections can be embedded using the `<help-video-collection>` element:

<help-video-collection data-id="getting-started"></help-video-collection>

A placeholder will also be displayed if the collection cannot be found:

<help-video-collection data-id="not-found"></help-video-collection>
